extendedInfo.description: Recoil Free - a free and fun physics game with extremely addictive gameplay and a great replayability factor!FEATURES: - Very simple! Very addictive! - Great replayability factor - New look each launch - Global leaderboards by Scoreloop or OpenFeint (you choose!) - 8 achievements to unlock! - Online Profiles / Friend Finding - Heyzap check-in service - For kids and adults! - Automatic save on pauseThis version of Recoil is fully functional and supported by ads. Premium version is also available in Market: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.chipsteam.recoilSocial services provided by Scoreloop and OpenFeint.Challenge players around the world by submitting your score to the global leaderboard, provided by Scoreloopâs or OpenFeint's social mobile gaming platforms.Heyzap allows you to check in and tell your friends about your results! - From the makers of another great game "Pobs" (>50 000 downloads!) - HTC Android Developer Contest participant - App2SD card support - Small, normal and large screens compatibility  - Android 1.6-2.3 - Languages: English, Russian, UkrainianThis version is supported by ads (ad-free version of Recoil is available for only $0.99)."Simple and ingenious" / "Un gioco semplice e geniale" - AndroideminimalistaWHY DOES IT NEED PERMISSIONS?All permissions are needed for online high-score features (Scoreloop) and social services (OpenFeint), so please don't worry about this!

reviews.title: Great but glitchy
reviews.comment: The game itself is fun. It\'s simple and challenging. The one problem is a very common glitch where the ball passes randomly teleports around the screen instead of hitting the lines. through the lines, or it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wowwwww!
reviews.comment: It\'s good I\'m not going to stop playing it any.  Time any were
reviews.author: Ezekiel Okpaku

reviews.comment: Restarts everytime i get a text or slide open the keyboard. Actually took me to level 0. Lol. Droid 1

reviews.title: Problems on new phone
reviews.comment: Fun but serious calibration problems on RAZR with ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This developer has THEE best games. Very addictive, fun, and challenging! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this game and POBS!! They\'re the best!!

reviews.comment: Cool game. One of the few I play all time.
